name: SmartSolarbySUNNAI
0:
”Alexa, open Smart Solar”
”Alexa, ask Smart Solar what my status is.”
”Alexa, ask Smart Solar for the solar headlines.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart solar
des:
Renew the Nation powered by SUNNAI offers smart energy and solar information that is available on-demand to engage consumers and to inform of conditions, efficiencies, opportunities and optimal uses of energy and water. Invoke our smart solar skill to ask questions and receive responses that empower smart energy and water conservation. We understand that an engaged and informed consumer is important to decisions about energy and water usage. Some key features include:

 Smart energy insights and news
 Solar PV and Solar Thermal information
 Opportunities and ways to save
